transcript: I felt what you said a shame somehow because nobody was changed at all It seemed to make suckers out of a lot of guys. I felt wrong to be alive to Open the new bank book drive the new car see the new refrigerator

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And I felt what you said, ashamed somehow 'cause nobody was changed at all.  It seemed to make suckers out of a lot of guys.  I felt wrong to be alive to open the new bank book, drive the new car, see the new refrigerator.
